Layer.UpdateCommand:
%function(self) local Num = MarathonNumber + 1
if Num == 1 or Num == 21 or Num == 31 then self:settext( MarathonNumber + 1 ..'st') elseif Num == 2 or Num == 22 or Num == 32 then self:settext( MarathonNumber + 1 ..'nd') elseif Num == 3 or Num == 23 or Num == 33 then self:settext( MarathonNumber + 1 ..'rd') else self:settext( MarathonNumber + 1 ..'th') end
end
